official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress commemorating the heroism and lifetime achievements of the late General James H. "Jimmy" Doolittle, who died on September 27, 1993.

summary.text: Expresses the thanks of the Nation in memory of General James H. "Jimmy" Doolittle, hero, aviation pioneer, scientist, and patriot, for his lifetime of service.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress commemorating the heroism and lifetime achievements of the late General James H. "Jimmy" Doolittle, who died on September 27, 1993.
